Articles.Content:
Recently, I installed a new windows update, and after that no matter what the game always crashes before the title screen loads, the report file claiming it is an Access Violation. I have tried everything, from changing the way it loads, to wiping it completely off my computer and reinstalling it. Can anyone help me out here?

The log says this:

 

Unity Player [version: Unity 5.4.0p4_b15b5ae035b7]

KSP_x64.exe caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)
  in module KSP_x64.exe at 0033:d565fef6.

Error occurred at 2018-01-01_205528.
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP_x64.exe, run by PitsRus.
49% memory in use.
8175 MB physical memory [4124 MB free].
10095 MB paging file [5882 MB free].
134217728 MB user address space [134215989 MB free].
Read from location 00000028 caused an access violation.

Context:
RDI:    0x00000000  RSI: 0x0053ea78  RAX:   0x000017a8
RBX:    0x3fedad20  RCX: 0xd6157c90  RDX:   0x0053ea78
RIP:    0xd565fef6  RBP: 0x3fedad78  SegCs: 0x00000033
EFlags: 0x00010246  RSP: 0x0053e9a0  SegSs: 0x0000002b
R8:    0x3fedad78  R9: 0x00000000  R10:   0x0053ea80
R11:    0x00000000  R12: 0x32ae3320  R13:   0x00000000
R14:    0x00000252  R15: 0x00000000

Bytes at CS:EIP:
49 8b 5f 28 4d 8d 67 20 49 3b dc 74 3c 66 66 66
Hi, welcome to the forums. Please provide all the information specified here:
